Name: Dnaxcat vr
About the game: DNAXCAT VR is a crucial part of DNAXCAT Metaverse. On this cloud square, there are many little monsters will interactive with you. We suggest all friends who have seen animation of DNAxCAT to download and play. In the future, we'll keep refining and developing systems including plots, guilds, territory, forging, collecting, and battle. Moreover, the animation series will be used as the key of storyline Following basic functions are included in free version. 1. Voice chat in online gaming. 2. Running, Jumping and Rainbow slide. 3. Little monster battle mode. 4. Type online chatting (Non VR Mode) 5. Non VR Mode gaming experience. There are more functions and systems will be released by DLC in near future.
